Keybindings and macros and things

Ack
===
cmd-shift-f Ack

Twitter
=======
:FriendsTwitter
:{count}FriendsTwitter show twitter, for optionally, page {count} of feed.
,g open URL at cursor

TaskList
========
,lt show TODO/FIXMEs in buffer for current buffer

NERDTree
========
,nt open/close NERDTree

TagBar
======
,tb toggle tagbar

NERDCommenter
=============
cmd-/ comment line
,cs comment region (c-style)
,cc comment region (c++ style)

VimWiki
,ww open vimwiki index.

MISC
====
,SPACE clear search highlighting
